name: Beneath a Steel Sky
description:
This script will install "Beneath a Steel Sky" GOG edition for ScummVM.
Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Mulltilanguage: once you launched game, press "CTRL+F5" to access main ScummVM interface, select the game "Beneath a Steel Sky", at the right click "Edit" button and choose your preferred language.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.gog: N/A: Plese select the GOG.com installer

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR"; rm -f -r app commonappdata __redist scummvm __support tmp goggame-1207658695.* ;

script.custom-name: Beneath a Steel Sky - GOG - ScummVM

content:
custom-name: Beneath a Steel Sky - GOG - ScummVM
files:
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- gog: 'N/A: Plese select the GOG.com installer'
game:
  game_id: sky
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: --extract $gog --output-dir "$CACHE/sky"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/
    src: $CACHE/sky
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR"; rm -f -r app commonappdata __redist scummvm __support
      tmp goggame-1207658695.* ;
scummvm:
  aspect: true
